data.Name: Monolord
data.Bio: Monolord is a doom metal band from in Gothenburg, Sweden. Formed in 2013, the outside world took notice in a big way as the trio of Thomas V Jäger (vocals, guitars), Esben Willems (drums), and Mika Häkki (bass) garnered a flurry critical acclaim for their RidingEasy Records debut, Empress Rising, a year later. Decibel Magazine decreed them, “your new favorite band,” New Noise Magazine called the album, “fantastic,” and This Is Not A Scene announced Read more on Last.fm
